text: Cannonball Run is a 1981 American Hong Kong action comedy movie starring Burt Reynolds, Jackie Chan, Dom DeLuise and Farah Fawcett. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1981 action movies Category:1981 comedy movies Category:1980s road movies Category:Hong Kong action movies Category:Hong Kong comedy movies Category:American action movies Category:American comedy movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Hal Needham Category:Movies set in Connecticut
title: Cannonball Run
